basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Education Professional Studies who are pursuing a degree within the Curriculum and Instruction department. Eligibility Requirements The scholarship is open to any student whose major is in the Curriculum and Instruction department Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
